turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I need to schedule an appointment with Dr. Emily Carter. It's been so hard to get through to the office lately!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help with that. To schedule an appointment with Dr. Carter, could you please provide your full name and date of birth?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's John Smith, and my birthday is 05/12/1988.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, Mr. Smith. Let me check Dr. Carter's availability. What is the reason for your visit?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: It's for my annual physical. I'm hoping to get it done sometime in the next two weeks. Are there any openings then?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, one moment. It appears Dr. Carter has an opening on July 18th at 2:00 PM. Does that work for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, July 18th... That's a Wednesday, right? I might be able to make that work. If I can't, what are my options regarding seeing another doctor in the practice sooner?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, July 18th is a Wednesday. Let me check availability with Dr. Lee and Dr. Davis. With Dr. Lee, there is an opening on July 12th at 10:00 AM and with Dr. Davis, July 16th at 3:30 PM.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, great! I'll take the appointment with Dr. Lee on July 12th at 10:00 AM. Thanks so much for your help! That was way easier than calling.
